author: rfeng
msg: Fix for TUSCANY-1146. Thanks Scott for providing the patch.

author: pquerna
msg: Fix apr_file_writev when buffering is enabled by forcing a flush, rather than writing underneath the write buffer.

author: ate
msg: First part of a major overhaul of the installer.
- dropping exisiting tables before trying to create anew
- make sure Spring sees the assembly resource directories as file resources (this fixes Linux resource resolving) for db-seed
More improvements and fixes will follow later, but this should make it possible to actually install Jetspeed
